message: Reminder: You are registered for Converting Leads to Clients: Navigating the Critical Moments in Legal Consultations on Friday, March 22nd at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT.
You can use this link to join us.
If you have trouble, please contact Justia Support for assistance.

Frustrated with losing leads? We have the key! At our upcoming Justia webinar, join guest speaker Adam Boyd as he discusses how to best navigate consultations to increase client retention and elevate your practice to its full potential.

You’re invited to join our guest speaker Adam Boyd as he reveals how you can best navigate client consultations to advance your practice. Converting Leads to Clients: Navigating the Critical Moments in Legal Consultations begins promptly at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT on Friday, March 22, 2024.
bottomline: Seats are limited, so reserve yours today!

message: Are you looking to convert more leads into actual clients? Join us at our upcoming Justia webinar to learn how to improve your consultation process, increase your lead conversion, and get the clients you’ve been looking for!
Converting Leads to Clients: Navigating the Critical Moments in Legal Consultations begins promptly at 2 p.m. ET / 11 a.m. PT on Friday, March 22, 2024.
Reminder: You are registered for Converting Leads to Clients: Navigating the Critical Moments in Legal Consultations today, January 26, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT.
You can use this link to join us.
If you have trouble, please contact Justia Support for assistance.
message3: Please note: This presentation is accredited for one hour of General CLE credit in California. It has been submitted to the State Bar of Texas Committee on MCLE and is pending review.
If you want to earn CLE credit for your attendance at this webinar, you will need to upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to take advantage of this exclusive benefit.

message: Hi Name,

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 2:00 p.m. PT on Sunday, March 10, 2024, to receive credit.
Completing Your Attendance Verification
number-list: Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the CLE presentation.
Download your certificate, and you’re done!
message2: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.

message: Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, Converting Leads to Clients: Navigating the Critical Moments in Legal Consultations. We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
Do you have an idea for a future speaker or topic? Let us know!
